Zesty.io | Software Engineer | San Diego, CA | ONSITE | Full Time

Our product is a SaaS marketing platform for managing and publishing digital content. Currently the core of this experience is a CMS built to focus on multi site management. The platform also contains a suite of tools for marketers such as; Analytics, SEO and Social.

We are seeking a developer experienced in building service based architectures. You would be integral in scoping, building, testing, monitoring and scaling the services that support this platform. Currently our stack consists of Node.js, PHP, MySQL, NoSQL and Redis.

Apply: https://zesty.io/about/careers/software-engineer/
